name: TrickTrack
description:
It is a 3D local match game for two players where you and your friend play as thrower or runner. When playing as thrower you must throw items (hazards and supplies) from truck whereas when playing as runner you must arrive at school before time up.The game proceed with multiple turns of role swapping, you will be played as runner or thrower in turns. The game will announce winner when one player's health depelete to zero or fail to arrive at school.

CIGA Game Jam 2022
